name: IBM HTTP Server V8.5.5 on a single virtual machine - Amazon EC2
description: This template deploys a standalone instance of IBM HTTP Server 8.5.5 on a Linux virtual machine.

metadata.longDescription: This template deploys a standalone instance of IBM HTTP Server 8.5.5 on a Linux virtual machine.

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description:
• Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
  • Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6
  • Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Ubuntu 14.04 LTS

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
• 1 virtual machine:
  • IBM HTTP Server instance

bullets.title: Software Deployed
bullets.description:
• IBM HTTP Server for WebSphere Application Server V8.5.5
  • Web Server Plug-ins for IBM WebSphere Application Server V8.5.5
  • IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition V8

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
  2. Detailed system requirements for IBM HTTP Server 8.5.5 - https://www.ibm.com/software/reports/compatibility/clarity/index.html
  3. IBM Knowledge Center for IBM HTTP Server 8.5.5 - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSEQTJ_8.5.5
  4. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
